title: Personal Website
description: Create your own personal website using Bootstrap

steps.title: Trinket Starter Project
steps.description: To create a personal website we will be using Trinket

components.text: Trinket is an online HTML editor
**On the previous screen** click 'Open Starter Web Project' to open a Trinket window
Has a Trinket window opened on the right?
On the left of the Trinket screen is the code editor
When the Trinket window opened did an alert saying 'Hello World' open?
Select the 'script.js' file tab and comment out the `alert` using `//` at the beginning

lines: In JavaScript `//` comments out a line
Commenting a line stops the computer executing it

components.text: On the right is the Trinket screen is where your code output is shown
Is your website display completely blue?
Edit the 'style.css' file to stop the `body` element being blue

lines: In CSS code between `/*` and '*/' will be commented

components.text: To save your work you need a Trinket account, **click the login button**
Enter your email address and password then **click Create Account**
Have you managed to create a Trinket account?
Now **click Remix** to make your own copy of the Trinket
Did you successfully remix the Trinket project?
